name: Bounce Plus!
description:
Bounce and Bounce Back are back in Android! 

  • Features Levels 1 - 21 from Bounce and more levels from Bounce Back 
  • HD graphics 
  • Made in Max2D 

It is currently in development, but I released a debug version.

If you found a bug, please email me with your session number at alexisjhongaspar21(at)gmail.com or message my Facebook page at facebook.com/mibg.ph
